title: Migrated from DOTA looking for people to play LOL with
body:
Hey just migrated from DOTA looking for people on League to play with, Don't care the skill as long as they are not toxic players and want to win.

Feel free to add me Sccc   .. For some reason I can't post this in team recruitment :(

replies.body: I made the switch about a year ago. Run while you can xD
Turn around and never look back.
Welcome to the most toxic community in the world!

Don't do it bro, go back to DotA.
All you'll find here is nuclear waste (ie toxic behaviour).
